welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Hayesville, a charming town nestled in the foothills of the Appalachian Mountains. Known for its scenic beauty and quaint shops, we invite you to explore and experience all that our lovely city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at McNary Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at McNary Field Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Mal Airport handles the transportation of goods and freight.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Albany Airport is where all domestic and international flights are located.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal B is used for regional and commuter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
